comments:
1) add a managed C project
2) add a test.h file to the project
3) change test.h properties by changing them e.g. to excluded from build

sometimes it gets to the following line of code:

tool = rcCfg.getToolsToInvoke()[0]; (BuildDescription.java:542)

A further question is: has exclude form build a meaning for .h files ?
